frontmatter.title: Azure Landingzone for n00bs
frontmatter.description: Azure landingzone er en strukturert og organisert måte å sette opp og administrere et Azure-miljø på. Det er spesielt nyttig for bedrifter som ønsker å migrere eller modernisere programvaren sin i skyen, da det gir en strukturert tilnærming til å håndtere alt fra sikkerhet og governance til skalerbarhet og nettverk.

frontmatter.title: GitOps for noobs
frontmatter.description: GitOps is a relatively new approach to application development that has been gaining popularity in recent years. It is a way to use Git as the single source of truth for managing your applications, making it easy to deploy, update, and rollback changes.

frontmatter.title: Our Collaborative Approach
frontmatter.description: At our core, we believe that delivering as a comprehensive team is the best approach for both our partners and customers. It enables us to actively and quickly tap into our collective expertise to solve any technical challenge, helping our customers find smart solutions to their problems in an efficient way.

frontmatter.title: Live Event - Introduction to GitOps
frontmatter.description: In this inaugural meetup event, we want to share our thoughts on the concept of GitOps, why we need it and how it can be implemented.

previous.title: 7 Tips for å lykkes med DevOps
